text: Christian Lavieille (born 16 December 1965) is a French racing driver and former motorcycle road racer. As a motorcycle racer, he won the FIM Endurance World Championship in 1998 and the Bol d'Or three times (1996, 1999 and 2001). ==24 Hours of Le Mans results== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !
